p: Regardless of the sex, survival did not show to significantly differ between S ANG, AR wP and AR wP-M Ae albopictus ( Fig 1). The average female life span was slightly higher than 38 days in all of the three Ae. albopictus lines under these experimental conditions (P = 0.984, log rank test). Average life expectancy for males was reduced to about 30 days in all of the tested lines (P = 0.984, log rank test).
